content: * Says it changes CEO of the co to Cho Yong Byung from Han Dong Woo  due to Han Dong Woo's termination of his office
name: Shinhan Financial Group Co Ltd
title: BRIEF-Shinhan Financial Group changes CEO to Cho Yong Byung

content: * Says it plans to pay annual cash dividend as 1 450 won/share for FY 2016  to shareholders of record on Dec. 31  2016
name: Shinhan Financial Group Co Ltd
title: BRIEF-Shinhan Financial Group to pay annual dividend as 1 450 won/share for FY 2016
